resources.string: Paste image or MFC url and crop

This application was made for fun for Wonder Festival by creating your own bingo card. I hope you enjoy using it. You can add a custom image with an image URL or myfigurecollection supported link and label it with your hopes and dreams.

 I do not own any of the images or sounds used in this app, Wonder Festival (logo) or myfigurecollection as this app was made for fun.
 Licensed with MIT license (view github link).

 Thanks to the libraries used
 ● Picasso
 ● uCrop

 Creators:
 ● Matthew Ng (programming & planning)

To use images in this app, you need to allow read/write access to device.
Data stored is corrupted, would you like to delete it?
Wait till bingo animation finishes before attempting
